name: Heritage Game Jam 2020 - Paper Crusher
description:
[Made in Unity]

Miss your highly awaited lunch break everyday in school just to have fun with your friends? Reminisce those days of folding paper "Crash Cars" again!

Play alone, or with a friend, in an all-out battle royale of Paper Crusher! Flick your paper craft and try to knock out as many enemies as you can!

Each knock out is worthed 1 point! Accumulate the most points to win!
